item.title: Week 1: Principles by Ray Dalio
item.description: This book is a collection of principles. Ray Dalio is an amazing guy. A billionaire investor. this book is a must read.
item.content:
This book is a collection of principles.

Ray Dalio is an amazing guy. A billionaire investor.

this book is a must read.
